artist: Manufacturer: Royal Doulton Potteries; Decorator: F. Hancock
description: brown toned ground; decoration of three flowers and several buds, all yellow toned with blue toned leaves; gilt highlights; gilded scalloped border
life_date: Burslem, Staffordshire, and Stoke-on-Trent, English, est. 1815
markings: on bottom: \'Daulton\'s\', impressed; \'Daulton Burslem\', in brown; \'Davis Collamore/New York\', in green; on front: \'F. Hancock\', in purple, near edge
title: Dinner plate
